prepare($sql); if ($search) { $search = "%$search%"; $stmt->bindParam(':search', $search); } else { $search = "%"; $stmt->bindParam(':search', $search); } $stmt->execute(); $results = $stmt->fetchAll(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC); $portfolios = []; foreach ($results as $result) { $id = $result['mahasiswa_id']; if (!isset($portfolios[$id])) { $portfolios[$id] = [ 'mahasiswa_id' => $result['mahasiswa_id'], 'nama_mahasiswa' => $result['nama_mahasiswa'], 'nim' => $result['nim'], 'profile_image' => $result['profile_image'], 'jurusan' => $result['jurusan'], 'prodi' => $result['prodi'], 'keahlian' => $result['keahlian'], 'jk' => $result['jk'], 'alamat' => $result['alamat'], 'tahun_masuk' => $result['tahun_masuk'], 'status' => $result['status'], 'email' => $result['email'], 'sertifikasi' => [], 'lomba' => [], 'pelatihan' => [], 'proyek' => [] ]; } $portfolios[$id][$result['type']][] = [ 'id' => $result['id'], 'title' => $result['title'], 'date' => $result['date'], 'evidence' => $result['evidence'] ]; } return $portfolios; } $search = isset($_GET['search']) ? $_GET['search'] : null; $portfolios = getStudentPortfolios($pdo, $search); ?> Poliban Mahasiswa Portofolio
